meta.article_title: February 1, 2016 - Holding Back Against a Weaker Player

holding_back_against_a_weaker_player.probleme: Holding back against a weaker player

debutant: play your best game without playing overly safe or risky

exercices_complementaires.nom: loop a given ball rather hard
exercices_complementaires.description: let muscle memory guide you; spread risk over entire match

metriques_progression: spread the 'risk' over an entire match
erreurs_a_eviter: playing soft and erratic; giving opponent easier shots to respond to
